summary: Bumbling detective Stan Laurel disguises himself as a famous matador in order to hide from the vengeful Richard K. Muldoon, who spent time in prison on Stan's bogus testimony.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Margo Woode|Richard Lane|Carol Andrews|Diosa Costello|Rafael Alcayde|Rory Calhoun|Steve Darrell|Lorraine De Wood|Joe Dominguez|Robert Filmer|Edward Gargan|Gus Glassmire|Irving Gump|Kenner G. Kemp|Paul Kruger|Lois Laurel|Roger Neury|Jay Novello|Ralph Platz|Lillian Porter|Jose Portugal|Daniel Rea|Cyril Ring|Julian Rivero|Henry Russell|Johnnie Russo|Ralph Sanford|Emmett Vogan|Max Wagner|Hank Worden|Guy Zanette
director: Directors: Malcolm St. Clair (as Mal St. Clair), Stan Laurel (uncredited)
title: Stan y Oliver toreros
